name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering robust backend and frontend solutions. Proficient in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **Kotlin**, complemented by strong backend skills in **Python** (specifically **Django**, **Flask**) and **Express** frameworks. Expertise in database management with **PostgreSQL**, **SQLite**, and developing scalable RESTful APIs. Demonstrated ability to implement CI/CD pipelines using **Docker**, **Git**, and **GitHub**, ensuring seamless integration and delivery. A solid understanding of testing frameworks including **Jest**, **Jasmine**, and **Pytest** further enhances code quality. Recognized for contributing to pivotal projects at reputable organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, with a commitment to excellence in software development.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Django** to develop and maintain responsive frontend components and backend services, enhancing user engagement by **30%**.
Engineered scalable web applications with **Angular** and **TypeScript**, improving load times by **25%** and user interaction through intuitive UI.
Collaborated seamlessly across teams using **Git** and **GitHub** for version control, streamlining the development process and facilitating **10+** successful deployments monthly.
Implemented testing frameworks like **Jest**, **Jasmine**, and **Pytest** to enhance code quality, resulting in a **40%** reduction in production bugs.
Developed RESTful APIs with **Express** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring efficient data flow and integration, which improved client response time by **20%**.
Automated deployment pipelines using **Docker** and **CI/CD** practices, achieving a deployment success rate of **99%**.
Performed code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, elevating team performance and knowledge across **5+** projects.

Developed dynamic user interfaces and web applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experience and engagement by **30%**.
Engineered robust backend systems in **Python** and **Django**, ensuring seamless integration with frontend technologies and improving application response times by **40%**.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with **Express** to facilitate smooth data exchange and service orchestration across the application.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** and **SQLite** for efficient data management, improving query performance by **25%** through optimized database indexing strategies.
Adopted CI/CD practices using **Docker** and automated testing frameworks such as **Jest**, **Jasmine**, and **Pytest**, achieving deployment consistency and enhancing code quality across **95%** of releases.
Conducted code reviews and maintained version control using **Git** and **GitHub**, fostering a collaborative development environment.
Worked with **REST** and **JSON-RPC** protocols to enhance data transfer efficiency and ensure reliable application functionality.
Participated in cross-functional project discussions to align tech stack choices with program objectives and compliance requirements.

Leveraged **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to develop dynamic backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, improving trading operations by **30%**.
Utilized **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to engineer real-time price feed processors, ensuring delivery of up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions with a latency reduction of **15%**.
Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate data efficiently through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, enhancing user interaction and experience by **25%**.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements such as **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while upholding rigorous internal data security protocols, minimizing potential compliance risks by **40%**.
Implemented comprehensive test suites utilizing **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes which improved development cycles' efficiency by **50%**.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management to handle **10K** transactions per minute.
